metadata.title: CVE-2017-0588 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in id3/ID3.cpp in libstagefright inMediaserver could enable an attacker using a specially crafted file tocause memory corruption during media file and data processing. This issueis rated as Critical due to the possibility of remote code execution withinthe context of the Mediaserver process. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4,5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-34618607.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
